backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing users, bookings, invoices, profiles, and access control with admin/user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report mapping invoice-related features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind theme variables and base styles including light/dark mode tokens and print rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Inter font and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration defining layout, routes, and error screens for the app.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Authorization wrapper that enforces login and admin access before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Renders the shop logo with size variants and a fallback text logo if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/invoice/InvoiceC: Dialog for creating invoices with editable line items, discounts, tax, and shareable invoice links.
frontend/src/components/invoice/invoiceM: Contains utility functions for calculating invoice subtotal, discount, tax, and total amounts.
frontend/src/components/invoice/InvoiceR: Displays a formatted invoice receipt by parsing invoice details and rendering totals and metadata.
frontend/src/components/invoice/LineItem: Provides a UI to add, remove, and edit invoice line items with quantity and price fields.
frontend/src/components/invoice/receiptT: Defines reusable CSS class sets for consistent receipt styling and print visibility helpers.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays the site footer with shop info, navigation links, contact details, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Renders the main header with logo, navigation links, login button, and a mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: Error boundary component that catches runtime errors and shows an error screen.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorS: Presents a user-friendly error screen with details and a reload button.
frontend/src/constants/shopInfo.ts: Exports static shop information such as name, phone numbers, and address.
frontend/src/data/galleryItems.tsx: Defines GalleryItem interface and exports an array of repair service items with metadata and icons.
frontend/src/data/servicesCatalog.tsx: Defines service catalog categories and lists repair services with descriptions and timing info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides a hook to check if the current authenticated caller is an admin via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookings.ts: Implements hooks for creating, updating, and fetching bookings, both admin and public, using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInvoices.ts: Implements hooks for managing invoices including create, fetch, mark paid, and public access.
frontend/src/hooks/usePayments.ts: Fetches all payment instructions from the backend via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReviews.ts: Hooks for fetching and submitting reviews, sorting results and invalidating cache on updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, light/dark theme CSS variables, global base styles, mobile safe-area helpers, dynamic viewport height, and print-specific styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBookingsPage.tsx: Displays all bookings for admins with status management, loading/error states, and invoice generation dialog support.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Implements the customer booking form with validation, date/time conversion, and booking submission workflow.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders contact details including phone numbers, address, directions, and business hours.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a gallery grid of repair items with a dialog for viewing details and images.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceViewPage.tsx: Loads and displays a public invoice by ID and access code with print support and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Displays available payment methods and dynamically loaded payment instructions using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/PublicBookingsPage.ts: Shows a public list of bookings with status indicators, loading/error states, and a booking detail dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewsPage.tsx: Renders customer reviews and provides a form for submitting new reviews with validation and star display.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists service categories and individual services via an accordion layout with optional details and a booking CTA.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Presents shop information, hero image, contact details, and feature sections with navigation support.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Provides Safari‑safe utilities for formatting timestamps and converting date/time strings to nanoseconds.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s metadata, feature lists, and pending requests for invoice-related functionality.
